title: Broken
description: Clarity has a decision to make...Can she sacrifice one to save many?	Clarity Miller's life has changed dramatically since she met her guardian angel. She has learned that she's a Seer and now is expected to give up the life she knows and fight demons face-to-face. But even with all the death and destruction she knows that God has a big plan for her life.	Clarity accepts her calling and now has to use her Seer gifts to help the small town of Garlandton when a Fallen Angel named Livian arrives to play her devious games on the unsuspecting Garlandtonites. Broken, the second book in The Seer Society Series, will leave you asking one questionâ€”What do you believe?www.seersociety.com
author: Jenna Kay
